fields.title: Tokyo Teriyaki Skewers
fields.description: Tender chicken skewers glazed in sweet teriyaki sauce, sprinkled with toasted sesame seeds.

fields.title: Bangkok Street Pad Thai
fields.description: Wok-fried rice noodles with prawns, egg, bean sprouts, and peanuts in a tangy tamarind sauce.

fields.title: Rio BBQ Picanha
fields.description: Brazilian-style grilled rump with chimichurri and roasted garlic potatoes.

fields.title: Napoli Neapolitan Pizza Slice
fields.description: Hand-tossed dough, San Marzano tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil.

fields.title: Mumbai Masala Chicken
fields.description: Spiced grilled chicken in a rich tomato-onion gravy, served with roti.

fields.title: New York Hot Dog
fields.description: Classic beef sausage, mustard, ketchup, onions, and pickles in a soft bun.

fields.title: Cairo Kofta Wrap
fields.description: Spiced minced beef koftas wrapped with tahini, tomato, and parsley.

fields.title: Paris Croque-Monsieur
fields.description: Buttery toasted bread with ham, melted cheese, and béchamel sauce.

fields.title: Seoul Bulgogi Beef Bowl
fields.description: Thinly sliced beef marinated in soy, garlic, and sesame, served over rice.

fields.title: Mexico City Street Tacos
fields.description: Corn tortillas filled with slow-cooked beef, onion, and fresh coriander.

fields.title: Cape Malay Bunny Chow
fields.description: Hollowed bread loaf stuffed with curry — South Africa meets India.

fields.title: Caribbean Jerk Chicken
fields.description: Smoky and spicy jerk-marinated chicken with sweet plantains.

fields.title: Sydney Fish & Chips
fields.description: Beer-battered hake fillet with crispy fries and tartar sauce.

fields.title: Istanbul Doner Kebab
fields.description: Slow-roasted lamb, shredded and wrapped with salad and yoghurt sauce.

fields.title: Texas BBQ Ribs
fields.description: Fall-off-the-bone pork ribs smothered in smoky barbecue sauce.

fields.title: Shanghai Dumpling Basket
fields.description: Steamed pork and cabbage dumplings with soy dipping sauce.

fields.title: Lisbon Piri-Piri Prawns
fields.description: Grilled prawns in fiery Portuguese chilli sauce.

fields.title: Berlin Currywurst
fields.description: Sliced sausage topped with curry ketchup, served with fries.

fields.title: Athens Souvlaki Plate
fields.description: Skewered lamb with pita bread, tzatziki, and fresh salad.

fields.title: Havana Mojo Pork Sandwich
fields.description: Slow-cooked pork with zesty citrus-garlic sauce in a toasted roll.
